properties.headline: Rip Current Statement issued January 8 at 12:25PM ChST until January 10 at 5:00PM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
properties.description:
...NORTH TO NORTHEAST SWELL WILL PRODUCE HAZARDOUS SURF ALONG
NORTH FACING REEFS THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON...

* ALONG NORTH FACING REEFS...EXPECT HAZARDOUS SURF OF 8 TO 10
FEET TO GRADUALLY SUBSIDE BELOW HAZARDOUS LEVELS BY THURSDAY
AFTERNOON. THE RISK OF RIP CURRENTS WILL ALSO DROP TO MODERATE.

* ALONG EAST FACING REEFS...LARGER BREAKING WAVES WILL CONTINUE TO
GENERATE STRONG AND FREQUENT RIP CURRENTS. THE RISK OF RIP
CURRENTS SHOULD FALL TO MODERATE BY FRIDAY AFTERNOON.
properties.instruction:
DO NOT VENTURE OUT NEAR THE REEF LINE...ESPECIALLY ALONG NORTH FACING
REEFS. LARGE BREAKING WAVES MAY KNOCK YOU DOWN AND INJURE YOU. STRONG
RIP CURRENTS ALONG BOTH NORTH AND EAST FACING REEFS CAN SWEEP EVEN
THE BEST SWIMMERS AWAY FROM SHORE INTO DEEPER WATER. STAY OUT OF THE
WATER.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON
